works.description: This is a copyrighted image from the old Merlancia.com website; it may be on archive.org The logo super-imposed on the image is original, and is itself a copyrighted work,not used withing the confines of .fair use' . You can find the logo on display at http;//www.merlanciausa.com

This is a copyrighted photograph that I took myself, in a hotel-room after a long and stressful road-trip. I have the original and the rest of this set in a private-directory on our servers, which I will permit Google staff to access for verification. The photo was stolen out of that directory when it was originally a copyrighted gallery documenting the trip.

This is a copyrighted design; the copyright is joint-shared between Merlancia Industries and the designer; You can view a low-res sample of the original design layout on the joint-holder's website: Design By XS, Inc. Studios)

This is a copyrighted design; the copyright is joint-shared between Merlancia Industries and the designer; You can view a low-res sample of the original design layout on the joint-holder's website: Design By XS, Inc. Studios)

This image contains a photograph copyrighted by Merlancia Industries, Inc., plus images copyrighted by Amiga Corporation (a business affiliate), and used in a slanderous manner, not pursuant to 'parody' under the laws of 'fair use'. The original photograph is available for your consideration upon request: The directory in which it resides is password-protected due to multiple violations.

This webpage links to photographs copyrighted by AmigaZone/Merlancia Industries, Inc. (AmigaZone is a Merlancia property) The website even admits that the images used are copyrighted to AmigaZone, a Merlancia Industries property, but is not using them in accordance with 'fair use' under US Coyright law, and is using them not as a parody, but as an attack against the company and is committing acts is libel and slander int he process.

This page contains private, copyrighted  e-mails sent to, from and between company staff. There is no authorized use: These are copyrighted, private messages between Merlancia staff, under NDA and other staff.

This is a copyrighted photograph taken by one of my then-staff, in a hotel-room after a long and stressful road-trip. I have the original and the rest of this set in a private-directory on our servers, which I will permit Google staff to access for verification. The photo was stolen out of that directory when it was originally a copyrighted gallery documenting the trip.

This entire website contains numerous copyrighted images, including photographs of our then location, used without permission in an attempt at ruining company image, slander and libel. The photographs are in various locations, some of which were stolen directly from the references provided.
